comment.author: 26033330@N00
comment._content: This woman bears a striking resemblance to Margaret Mitchell the author of Gone With The Wind - you might want to find out if she visited Australia or was photographed by this photographer on her own turf.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sam2cents] Hi Sam! Thanks for your feedback. She does look a lot like Margaret Mitchell, both very photogenic women. I could not find any info on Mitchell visiting Australia & I think this image is perhaps a little after her time, looking at the clothes & hair. Perhaps one day we will track down this lady's identity :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
